body_html:
Is it possible to create a generic "select" function for tensor? Example usage:

     batch_size = tf.size(labels)
     logits_selected = tf.select(logits, tf.range(0, batch_size), labels)
     ....
body_text:
Is it possible to create a generic "select" function for tensor? Example usage:
     batch_size = tf.size(labels)
     logits_selected = tf.select(logits, tf.range(0, batch_size), labels)
     ....
body:
Is it possible to create a generic "select" function for tensor? Example usage:

```
     batch_size = tf.size(labels)
     logits_selected = tf.select(logits, tf.range(0, batch_size), labels)
     ....
```
